Articles.Content:
This pack add the function of Grab a part and Attach it to a surface to some stock parts.

Uses Kerbal Atachment System PlugIn (By: KospY).

Include Docking Strut mod (By JDP).

Uses Module Manager PlugIn

WARNING: Make a quick save before detach or attach parts. Have a tendency to blow up things.

WARNING: Do not time warp when you attach things to the ground. They will will magically desapear.

WARNING: If you have grabed or attached things to your kerbals, you can make the objets desaperar entering the kerbals to a pod.

Some albums about this Pack Stranded and Stranded2

Tell me here whatever issue you come up with the pack, and I will solve it as soon as I can.

You can post your images of what you have accomplished with the mod, here. also I would like to see some videos.

Edited June 17, 2013 by Locob
WOW! With some fixing and modification, it would be like functional EVA Orbital construction!
So did you add the KAS modules KospY posted here to a selection of parts?
I been doing it for a while now hehe, i think its nice you shared it so other players can try it out I think kas is great and it changed the way we could play ksp

So did you add the KAS modules KospY posted here to a selection of parts?

Exactly.

If you can help me to complete the set, (Especially the wheels) I will be grateful

This is awesome!

I could build a rocket on the Mun if i crash to get back!

Great, I have been wanting to download it, but Spaceport wouldn't let me.

Is there a limit to how heavy a part they can move?

Great, I have been wanting to download it, but Spaceport wouldn't let me.

Is there a limit to how heavy a part they can move?

I am making (at first) small parts that look light.

I'm trying ModuleManager.

Can't get it work properly yet.

The stock parts don't want to load some times.

Edit: Done!

Edited June 17, 2013 by Locob
ok i got your latest from spaceport, i see your edited parts with the * but the normal stock parts are not showing

ok i got your latest from spaceport, i see your edited parts with the * but the normal stock parts are not showing

They are just the stock parts with an asterisk. I added that just to know which have the "Attach Detach" properties.

The Idea of this mod, is that you can uninstall it and still have all your ships working.

Are you going to show this mod in the next brodcast?

Locob, can you clarify the mod indicated on spaceport in this quote from the mod change log?

"-Update to 0.20.x and added the attachment functionality to the Docking-Strut mod"

Thanks. Appreciate it. Well done.

EDIT: Nevermind, im blind.

Edited June 17, 2013 by OopsThatNotWork

Locob, can you clarify the mod indicated on spaceport in this quote from the mod change log?

"-Update to 0.20.x and added the attachment functionality to the Docking-Strut mod"

yeah. I think that line is a little bit confusing

means that I added Docking-Strut to the pack, but I had to update it to 0.20.x
Do you think we could get an option to snap to part attach points like in the vab, maybe even an option to toggle from place anywhere, to place anywhere with angle snap also in the vab.

Do you think we could get an option to snap to part attach points like in the vab, maybe even an option to toggle from place anywhere, to place anywhere with angle snap also in the vab.

I would like that to.

But is a question to the creator of Kerbal Attachment System

Could you please use module manager?

it would make this so much better to use.
I am using it. Check the last version update.

Something strange is happening.. The mod looks like it's not compatible with mechjeb. After I installed this mod, all my ships using mechjeb got erased, and when I enter VAB it says "ship cannot be loaded because mumech.MJ2.AR202 is missing". But it IS there, it's in the gamedata folder and the debug shows that the part is loaded, I also don't see anything weird in it's loaded .cfg... WHAT IS GOING ON??
Any news on this mod?

Can you please make a separate folder for your own mod's files and not mix it with KAS?

I spent a fair amount of time looking for a problem in my game, and it was the modulemanager that was buried in the KAS folder.

my computer exploded.

all suggestions are noted

until I fix my pc:

if you know how to solve some of the problems with the mod/pack, post it here. I will take no credit of it.
Can you pick up an assembly (a part with one or more parts attached to it), and if so, what happens to the other part(s)? Do they stay attached, fall off, or disappear (or crash the game)?
@strongest_2hu If you pick up an assembly, the main part you grabbed stays, but everything else falls off and explodes. It's fun, try it
Is the mod going to be updated sometime? I can't attach anything in space or on Mun. I'm only ablet to grab parts but cannot attach them.
Bug with KAS, not the attachment pack.....
